name: Ground Service Technology
tag_list: erosion-control, swppp, hydroseeding, sand-bags, silt-fence, erosion-and-sediment-control, erosion-control-blankets, stormwater-pollution-prevention-plan, swppp-california, erosion-control-san-diego
overview:
Ground Service Technology, Inc. is serving industrial and commercial construction needs of California and San Diego offering erosion control, SWPPP, hydro seeding, pollution control, dust control and street sweeping services.

We are San Diego’s first “Full Service Erosion Control Company” dedicated to serving the community for construction needs. They owns and maintains its own fleet of Hydroseeding Trucks, Street Sweepers, Dump Trucks, Backhoes, Excavators, Bobcats, a Sand & Gravel Bag Manufacturing Facility & Rock Yard, Two Warehouses Full of BMP & Erosion Control Supplies, 24 Hr.
